how_does_it_works.first: The remote access settings are per specification. This means that, for example, equipment that does not have an individual configuration will use the configuration of the equipment group in which they are included. If this is not set, the client settings that own them are used. Finally, if none of these 3 levels is set, the overall configuration of your organization will be used.

contracts.tickets_details: In the 'Tickets per closing cycle' field, enter the total number of tickets included in this cycle. For example, if you fill in this field with 12 and your closing cycle is quarterly, this means that your client will be entitled to use 4 tickets per month. In the 'Excess ticket value' field, enter the amount charged for each ticket used in addition to the contracted amount. Excess tickets will be charged at the end of each cycle and not at the end of the month.
contracts.hours_details: In the 'Hours per closing cycle' field, enter the total hours that are included in this cycle. For example, if you fill this field with 12 and your closing cycle is quarterly, this means that your client will be entitled to use 4 hours per month. In the 'Excess hourly rate' field, enter the amount charged for each hour used in excess of the contracted amount. Excess hours will be charged at the end of each cycle and not at the end of the month.

licenses_explanations.explanations_below: Below are the explanations for each type of license:
licenses_explanations.base: License that allows registering attendants and enables all Tiflux modules, except for add-ons, which are purchased separately.
licenses_explanations.whatsapp: User license that allows using chat with WhatsApp API integration. Requires a Base license.
licenses_explanations.vnc: User license that allows VNC remote access to computers with an intelligent agent. Requires a Base license.
licenses_explanations.p2p: User license that allows VNC and P2P remote access to computers with an intelligent agent. Requires a Base license.
licenses_explanations.splashtop: User license that allows Splashtop remote access to computers with an intelligent agent. Requires a Base license.
licenses_explanations.equipments: License that allows the manual registration of resources.
licenses_explanations.agents: License that allows you to download and install intelligent agents on computers.
licenses_explanations.monitoring: License for monitoring computers with an intelligent agent and link monitoring.
licenses_explanations.api_unique_access: Enables the token to access the API with all permissions for one user at a time.
licenses_explanations.api_per_user: Enables API access using Tiflux login and password, with user-based permissions.
licenses_explanations.datawarehouse: License allows sending Tiflux data to BI.
